Level.title: Disability degree
Level.description: Disability degree. Value must be between 1.0 (fully disabled) and 0

License.title: Kind of driver licence, i
License.description: Kind of driver licence, i.e.: A, B1, etc

Document.title: Document name
Document.description: Document name. It could be a national document name, or passport

Id.title: Code with the serial number of the document for the CV principal

Personal.title: Personal information, not related with professional skills or qualifications

Given Name.title: Given name
Given Name.description: Given name. It can be multiple words for compound names

Family Name.title: Family name
Family Name.description: Family name. Depending on cultures, this field can be very different

Native Language.title: First learned language
Native Language.description: First learned language. Or preferred language if you had many

Pronoun.title: Pronoun to state how do you like to be addressed

Alias.title: Short name you commonly use or nickname

Avatar.title: Avatar
Avatar.description: Avatar. Image used to represent you without being an actual photo

Nationalities.title: Set of nationalities
Nationalities.description: Set of nationalities. If none is supplied, the birth of country is used

Disabilities.title: List of disabilities of a person

Own Vehicle.title: True if the CV holder have his own vehicle

Location.title: Area that may have different degrees of precision, from a whole country, to a street address

Region.title: Country region
Region.description: Country region. If set, can not be blank

City.title: City
City.description: City. If set, can not be blank

Postcode.title: Postcode
Postcode.description: Postcode. If set, can not be blank

Address.title: Street address
Address.description: Street address. If set, can not be blank

NullableLocation.title: Area that may have different degrees of precision, from a whole country, to a street address

Region.title: Country region
Region.description: Country region. If set, can not be blank

City.title: City
City.description: City. If set, can not be blank

Postcode.title: Postcode
Postcode.description: Postcode. If set, can not be blank

Address.title: Street address
Address.description: Street address. If set, can not be blank

Link.title: Link to a resource identifier, it can be `tel:`, `mailto:`, or the usual WWW ones

Tags.title: Set of tags that can be used to group a collection of links

Organization.title: Organization data (can be used for companies, educational institutions, etc
Organization.description: Organization data (can be used for companies, educational institutions, etc.)

Name.title: Name of the organization
Name.description: Name of the organization. If set can not be blank

Type.title: Organization's type (NGO, educational, government, etc
Type.description: Organization's type (NGO, educational, government, etc.). If set can not be blank

Industry.title: Industry (financial, industry, etc
Industry.description: Industry (financial, industry, etc.). If set can not be blank

NullableOrganization.title: Organization data (can be used for companies, educational institutions, etc
NullableOrganization.description: Organization data (can be used for companies, educational institutions, etc.)

Name.title: Name of the organization
Name.description: Name of the organization. If set can not be blank

Type.title: Organization's type (NGO, educational, government, etc
Type.description: Organization's type (NGO, educational, government, etc.). If set can not be blank

Industry.title: Industry (financial, industry, etc
Industry.description: Industry (financial, industry, etc.). If set can not be blank

Project.title: A span of time planned for achieving a goal or deliver a product

Title.title: Descriptive title of the professional experience
Title.description: Descriptive title of the professional experience. Cannot be blank

Website.title: URI with more information about the project

From.title: Project start date
From.description: Project start date. It must be equals or before the end date

Persons.title: People involved in the project (without including yourself)
Persons.description: People involved in the project (without including yourself). Must be greater than zero

Type.title: Project kind
Type.description: Project kind, i.e.: Web Application, Mobile Application, REST service, CLI, etc

To.title: Finish date of the project
To.description: Finish date of the project. Should be set to a date equals or before today

Summary.title: Brief description of the project
Summary.description: Brief description of the project. If set, blank values aren't allowed

Client.title: Third party for which the project was developed
Client.description: Third party for which the project was developed. If set can not be blank

Production.title: True if the project was also maintained in production

Highlights.title: Remarkable items achieved on this project
Highlights.description: Remarkable items achieved on this project. Empty text is not allowed

Roles.title: Set of roles played on the project
Roles.description: Set of roles played on the project. Blank items are not allowed

Skills.title: Skills used in the development of the project
Skills.description: Skills used in the development of the project. Empty texts are not allowed

Experience.title: Professional experience executed for an employer or a client

Position.title: Main role for which the person was hired at this professional experience
Position.description: Main role for which the person was hired at this professional experience. It can not be blank

Company.title: Permanent role company
Company.description: Permanent role company. If null, it means this is a contractor experience

From.title: Start date of the professional experience
From.description: Start date of the professional experience. It must be before the end date

To.title: End date of the professional experience
To.description: End date of the professional experience. Should be set to a date before today

Location.title: Location where the profesional experience was done
Location.description: Location where the profesional experience was done. If set, no blanks allowed

Summary.title: Brief description of the profesional experience
Summary.description: Brief description of the profesional experience. Blank values other than 'null' aren't allowed

Quit Reason.title: Reason that led to leave this professional experience

Projects.title: List of projects developed during this professional experience

Title.title: Descriptive title of the education
Title.description: Descriptive title of the education. Cannot be blank

Type.title: Education kind
Type.description: Education kind, i.e.: professional education or college. Cannot be blank

Institution.title: Organization in which the classes took place

From.title: Start date of the classes
From.description: Start date of the classes. It must be equals or before the end date

Website.title: URI with more information about the studies

To.title: End date of the classes
To.description: End date of the classes. Should be set to a date equals or before today

Area.title: Studies subject
Area.description: Studies subject, i.e.: Computer Science. If set, it cannot be blank

Location.title: Location where the classes took place

Summary.title: Brief description of the studies
Summary.description: Brief description of the studies. If set, blank values aren't allowed

Subjects.title: Set of topics covered in the studies

Course.title: Training course, as opposed to formal education

Title.title: Course title
Title.description: Course title. Can not be blank

Institution.title: Organization which run the course and/or award its certificate

From.title: Start date of the course
From.description: Start date of the course. It must be before the end date

To.title: End date of the course
To.description: End date of the course. Should be set to a date before today

Website.title: URI with more information about the course

Area.title: Course subject
Area.description: Course subject. If set, it cannot be blank

Location.title: Location where the training took place
Location.description: Location where the training took place. If set, no blanks allowed

Summary.title: Brief description of the course
Summary.description: Brief description of the course. Blank values other than 'null' aren't allowed

Company.title: Name of the company paying for the course

Hours.title: Number of effective hours of this course
Hours.description: Number of effective hours of this course. If set, should be greater than zero

Subjects.title: Set of topics covered in the course

Achievement.title: Professional achievement
Achievement.description: Professional achievement. Achievement accomplished at a given date. Publications must be owned by external parties in order to be an achievement, posts on social networks or personal blogs are listed in other CV sections

Title.title: Descriptive title of the achievement
Title.description: Descriptive title of the achievement. Cannot be blank

Date.title: Data in which the achievement was accomplished
Date.description: Data in which the achievement was accomplished. Cannot be after today

Website.title: Link with further information of the achievement, I
Website.description: Link with further information of the achievement, I.e.: the URI of a publication

Summary.title: Detailed description of the achievement
Summary.description: Detailed description of the achievement. It cannot be blank

Full Name.title: Referrer's name
Full Name.description: Referrer's name. Can not be blank

Summary.title: Reference details in plain text
Summary.description: Reference details in plain text. Can not be blank

Type.title: Relation among CV principal and referrer

Contact.title: Contact data of the referrer person

Projects.title: Projects in common with the referrer

Cv.title: CV data grouped by topics
Cv.description: CV data grouped by topics. Most of the fields are optional. When the model is rendered, the fields are passed to the template context with the names in camel case. Read only properties are meant only for use in templates, and cannot be defined in the document

$schema.title: Schema used for the document
$schema.description: Used to deal with different versions. It also eases the use on some editors

Locale.title: Locale representing the CV's content
Locale.description: Locale representing the CV's content. If not set, it will be `en`

Last Update.title: Date of the CV's latest modification

Resources.title: List of resources to be included in this CV
Resources.description: List of resources to be included in this CV. Allows CV modularization. Resources' content will be overwritten with the CV document content

Templates.title: Templates used to render this CV
Templates.description: Templates used to render this CV. Templates for different media types are supported using the template extension to select the appropriate one

Variables.title: Configuration added to the context when the CV is rendered
Variables.description: Configuration added to the context when the CV is rendered. Map keys must be in camel case

Bio.title: Bio, if set, cannot be blank

Goals.title: Professional goals
Goals.description: Professional goals. It cannot contain any blank item

Top Skills.title: Group of general skills to highlight

Links.title: List of links pointing to another resources (like social networks profiles)

Languages.title: List of languages aside of the birth language

Personal Projects.title: Personal projects developed outside a company

Volunteering.title: Experience on non govern organizations related with social or technical interests

Experience.title: Professional projects developed for a company

Courses.title: Specific courses on a given subject

Achievements.title: Professional achievements awarded by third parties
